sndctrl.cfg.sound.tooltip: General options for defining sound effects
sndctrl.cfg.sound.Individual.tooltip: Options to configure sounds on an individual basis
sndctrl.cfg.sound.StartupSounds.tooltip: Possible sounds to play when client reaches main game menu
sndctrl.cfg.sound.Mute.tooltip: Mute sound when Minecraft is in the background
sndctrl.cfg.sound.CullInterval.tooltip: Ticks between culled sound events (0 to disable culling)
sndctrl.cfg.logging.tooltip: Defines how Sound Control logging will behave
sndctrl.cfg.logging.EnableDebug.tooltip: Enables/disables debug logging of the mod
sndctrl.cfg.logging.VersionCheck.tooltip: Enables/disables display of version check information
sndctrl.cfg.logging.FlagMask.tooltip: Bitmask for toggling various debug traces
